"samaja madhyajala bhawithaya saha samajayen wenwi athayi yana hangima yanadeka atharin mulin siduwanne kumakda kiyala apita hariyatama kiyanna baha" yanuwen pawasana adala adhyayanaye sama karthru menma pitsbarg wishwa widyalaye lama roga pilibanda mahacharya elisabeth milar sandahan karanne samajayen hudakala wu bawak danena nisa tharuna tharuniyan samaja madhyajala walata yomuwima siduwiya haki bawaya.esema samaja madhya jala bhawithaya wadiwima hethuwen saba lokaya thula hudakalawima bandu hangimak athiwiya haki bawa da mahacharya milar pawasanniya.adala warthawa magin mathukara dakwa athi siddhantha anuwa, antharjalaya thula wadi kalayak gathakirima magin saba lokaya samaga saha sambandhathawa pawathwaganimata athi kalaya aduwana bawaya.samajayen hudakalawima thamata aaradhana nolabunu awasthawalata ekwu anekuth mithuru mithuriyan winodawana ayuru dakwena chayarupa samaja madhya jalawalin dakime di yameku thula thama pitastharayaku lesa danena hangima wadi wimata hethuwe.ihatha ki samikshanaya sandaha wayasa 19 th 32 th athara wadihitiyan 2000 k sahabhagi wi atha.
